about_the_game:
Houshou Marine × Tsugunohi


Houshou Marine, a very popular VTuber from hololive, and Tsugunohi, a horror game that invades your daily life, have miraculously collaborated.
A new experience of terror will strike you!



■ABOUT THIS GAME
"Tsugunohi" boasts a cult following on the Internet, with an astonishing 100 million video views.
With its innovative "just go left" game system, "Tsugunohi" has been the talk of the town as a completely new type of Japanese horror game.
Now, Houshou Marine, who has played many games in the "Tsugunohi" series, will appear in the "Tsugunohi" collaboration game.
A new chapter of horror unfolds as the secret of Houshou Marine's "good looks" is revealed.

■POINT
1）The "Tsugunohi" theme of "horror experiences that invade the everyday" has been retained, and Houshou Marine's charms are all over the place.
2）The experience of fear accelerates with each passing day.
3）There are also some small stories that fans of Houshou Marine's work will react to. Can you find them all?



■STORY
The protagonist finds himself a new crew member on a pirate ship led by Houshou Marine!
The main character is still delighted to see the real Houshou Marine's good looks, and he is hard at work.
However, a vague question arises in his mind.
Where the hell are the other members of the pirate ship?
He realizes something he shouldn't have, and one by one, horror after horror strikes him!


■PROFILE
《"Tsugunohi" series.》
A horror game in which the protagonist progresses sideways through various paths = stages, and his daily life is gradually eroded by fear. This is a popular masterpiece by ImCyan, who has created numerous horror games as an indie game creator.

《Houshou Marine》
She loves jewels, treasure, and money, and dreams of becoming a pirate and searching for treasure. She is currently a VTuber on land with the goal of buying a pirate ship.
She is a virtual talent who started her activities from the VTuber group "Hololive" in August 2019. She is active in a wide variety of activities such as live game playing and singing, and as of July 2023, she boasts 2.45 million registered users on her Youtube channel.

© 2016 COVER Corp./ImCyan/Vaka, Inc.
